languages.text: {n}Уставившись в глаза Вортену, Ульфар мрачно рычит:{/n} "Инстинкт говорит, что наш долг еще не выполнен до конца". {n}Ульфар переводит на вас выжидающий взгляд. Пальцы отведенной в сторону руки незаметно складываются в знак. Жест этот, один из самых универсальных среди немых языков Империума, означает "готов атаковать по команде".{/n}

{n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Уставившись в глаза Вортену, Ульфар мрачно рычит:{/n} "Инстинкт говорит, что наш долг еще не выполнен до конца". {n}Ульфар переводит на вас выжидающий взгляд. Пальцы отведенной в сторону руки незаметно складываются в знак. Жест этот, один из самых универсальных среди немых языков Империума, означает "готов атаковать по команде".{/n}

He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}

languages.text: {n}ウォルテンの瞳をじっとのぞき込み、ウルファーは厳しくののしる。{/n}「俺の本能が告げてる、お前の聖務はまだ終わっちゃいないってな」{n}ウルファーは視線をあなたに移し、期待のまなざしとともに遠慮がちに手を伸ばして合図をする。このジェスチャーは、帝国では広く知られた無音言語で、「命令を受ければ攻撃する用意ができている」ことを意味する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ウォルテンの瞳をじっとのぞき込み、ウルファーは厳しくののしる。{/n}「俺の本能が告げてる、お前の聖務はまだ終わっちゃいないってな」{n}ウルファーは視線をあなたに移し、期待のまなざしとともに遠慮がちに手を伸ばして合図をする。このジェスチャーは、帝国では広く知られた無音言語で、「命令を受ければ攻撃する用意ができている」ことを意味する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}乌尔法盯着沃尔腾的双眼，冷冷地咆哮着。{/n}“直觉告诉我，我们还没有完成所有应尽的职责。”{n}乌尔法期待地看向你，伸出的那只手不露痕迹地做了个手势。这是帝国手语中最通用的手势之一，意思是“随时准备听令攻击。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法盯着沃尔腾的双眼，冷冷地咆哮着。{/n}“直觉告诉我，我们还没有完成所有应尽的职责。”{n}乌尔法期待地看向你，伸出的那只手不露痕迹地做了个手势。这是帝国手语中最通用的手势之一，意思是“随时准备听令攻击。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar regarde Worten droit dans les yeux et gronde :{/n} « Mon instinct me dit que nous n'avons pas encore accompli notre devoir. » {n}Il tourne vers vous un regard chargé d'espoir, puis fait un signe discret de sa main tendue. Ce geste, l'un des plus universels dans les langages muets de l'Imperium, signifie « prêt à attaquer à votre commandement ».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar regarde Worten droit dans les yeux et gronde :{/n} « Mon instinct me dit que nous n'avons pas encore accompli notre devoir. » {n}Il tourne vers vous un regard chargé d'espoir, puis fait un signe discret de sa main tendue. Ce geste, l'un des plus universels dans les langages muets de l'Imperium, signifie « prêt à attaquer à votre commandement ».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, con Worten en la mirada, gruñe malhumorado:{/n} «El instinto me dice que aún no hemos cumplido nuestro deber». {n}Ulfar dirige su mirada expectante hacia ti. Disimuladamente, hace una señal con la mano extendida. Este gesto, uno de los más universales entre las lenguas mudas del Imperium, significa «listo para atacar».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, con Worten en la mirada, gruñe malhumorado:{/n} «El instinto me dice que aún no hemos cumplido nuestro deber». {n}Ulfar dirige su mirada expectante hacia ti. Disimuladamente, hace una señal con la mano extendida. Este gesto, uno de los más universales entre las lenguas mudas del Imperium, significa «listo para atacar».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar starrt Worten in die Augen und knurrt grimmig:{/n} "Mein Instinkt sagt mir, dass wir unsere Pflicht noch nicht ganz erfüllt haben." {n}Ulfar sieht dich erwartungsvoll an. Er gibt dir mit seiner ausgestreckten Hand unauffällig ein Zeichen. Diese Geste, eine der bekanntesten in den stummen Sprachen des Imperiums, bedeutet 'bereit, auf Euren Befehl anzugreifen'.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar starrt Worten in die Augen und knurrt grimmig:{/n} "Mein Instinkt sagt mir, dass wir unsere Pflicht noch nicht ganz erfüllt haben." {n}Ulfar sieht dich erwartungsvoll an. Er gibt dir mit seiner ausgestreckten Hand unauffällig ein Zeichen. Diese Geste, eine der bekanntesten in den stummen Sprachen des Imperiums, bedeutet 'bereit, auf Euren Befehl anzugreifen'.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, Worten'ın gözlerine bakarken gaddarca homurdanıyor.{/n} "İçgüdülerim bana görevimizin henüz tamamen sona ermediğini söylüyor." {n}Ulfar, beklenti içindeki bakışlarını sana yöneltiyor. Uzattığı eliyle dikkat çekmeden bir işaret yapıyor. Bu el işareti, İmparatorluk işaret dilleri arasında en bilineni ve "emrinle saldırıya hazırım" anlamına geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Staring into Worten's eyes, Ulfar snarls grimly,{/n} "Instinct tells me that our duty is not yet fully done." {n}Ulfar shifts his expectant gaze to you. He unobtrusively makes a sign with his outstretched hand. This gesture, one of the most universal among the mute languages of the Imperium, means "ready to attack on command."{/n}
